start.description-of-area: You find yourself in a small dilapidated cottage.

north.description: To the north there is a door exiting this old cottage
north.actionText: As you open the old door it creaks loudly, and you close it gently behind you.

west.description: An old wooden wall with no windows or doors is to your west.

garden.description-of-area: You find yourself in a small overgrown garden with a large forest all around you.

north.description: To the north lies a small well, with a rope leading into a seemingly bottomless abyss.
north.actionText: As you descend the well you feel its moist walls brushing off your skin with every step.

south.description: The door you just exited through is to the south.
south.actionText: You make your way back inside the small, old cottage.

east.actionText: The forest here is too thick to pass through.

west.actionText: The forest here is too thick to pass through.

tunnel.description-of-area: After descending the well you find yourself in what seems to be a tunnel.

north.actionText: A wall of dirt prevents you from venturing north.

south.actionText: Oh no! The rope you used to descend has torn.

east.description: A tunnel to the east leads to a dusty wooden door, slightly ajar.
east.actionText: As you walk towards the door the wind coming through the well makes for an eerie theme.

west.description: The tunnel to the west leads to a wall of cobwebs
west.failedActionText: You claw at the cobwebs with your bare hands, but are too inept to pass through them without the right tool...
west.actionText: The sword will allow you to cut through these cobwebs with ease.

cellar.description-of-area: After entering through the ajar door you are met with what appears to be some sort of sick torture chamber.

east.description: A room appears to be hidden down here, seperate from the torture chamber.
east.actionText: The hidden room appears to be an office with a case containing a massive sword. Whatever could the owner need that for!?

west.description: The tunnel you passed through is to the west.
west.actionText: You head back to the tunnel.

secret-office.description-of-area: You have stumbled upon a secret office hidden in the depths.

west.description: The torture chamber lies to the west.
west.actionText: You return to the torture chamber.

cave.description-of-area: After hacking your way through the cobwebs you find myself in a large open cave face to face with an enormous spider.

north.actionText: The cave walls loom over you.

south.description: All that lies to the south is a mound of dead and rotten creatures.

east.description: The tunnel is to the east.
east.actionText: Spooked by the cave you return to the tunnel.

west.description: You spot a slope to the west leading to an exit in the cave roof.
west.actionText: You hurriedly exit the cave and find yourself in a clearing in the thick forest.

clearing.description-of-area: Upon scaling the ladder you are finally met with the smell of fresh air as you exit into a clearing in the dense forest.

north.description: A long winding pathway leads out of the clearing and towards a large metal gate in the distance.
north.actionText: Not wanting to descend into the hellish cave again you decide to make your way east.

south.actionText: The impenetrable forest has thwarted your plans to head south once again.

east.description: A hole to the east leads back to the cave.

west.actionText: The impenetrable forest has thwarted your plans to head west once again.

impassable-gate.description-of-area: A large metal gate impedes me from venturing any further.

north.actionText: Nothing of note lies to the north.

south.description: You can still see the clearing to the south.
south.actionText: You return to the clearing for a breather.

east.description: A large keyhole in the center of the gate provides some hope.
east.actionText: You insert the key and sure enough, it unlocks the gate.

west.actionText: The impenetrable forest has thwarted your plans to head west once again.

ominous-tower.description-of-area: A large ominous tower looms above you. You feel an other-worldly power omitting from its highest chamber.

north.description: A large door greets you at the foot of the tower.
north.actionText: You enter through the door, and a feeling of impending doom overcomes you as you make your way to the tower chamber.

south.actionText: The impenetrable forest has thwarted your plans to head south once again.

east.actionText: Going east would plunge you into a lake. You decide that would not be ideal and turn around.

west.description: The gate leads back to the winding pathway.

tower-chamber.description-of-area: You enter the tower's chamber and are awestruck as you discover a large floating orb raditating in the middle of the room.

north.actionText: The chamber only has one entrance.

south.description: The door closes behind you and clicks softly.
south.actionText: The door has locked behind you. It appears that you have been trapped by powers unknown.

east.actionText: The chamber only has one entrance.

west.actionText: The chamber only has one entrance.
